Purchase Leave Policy

“Employees can purchase a maximum of 2 weeks of Additional Leave in a financial year, using a salary sacrifice deduction scheme.”

Employees will have their salary/wages proportionally deducted using a salary sacrifice scheme calculated on the current salary/wages based on the number of weeks they purchase.

Purchased leave must be taken before the 30th or will be reimbursed
